utils.topikSchedule: Jigilar ciki - Yana Koyo abubuwan da suka faru

utils.notFound: Babu darussan da aka samo a wannan rukunin.

content.title: Vivelg - Koyi It online don kyauta | Yana kwantar da hankali da jarrabawa
content.oneStopPlatform: Vivelog - na ƙarshe kyauta kyauta yana koyon dandamali
content.startLearningNow: Fara koyo shi & shirya don taken taken
content.whyChooseVieVlog: Me yasa za a zabi vievelog domin yana koyo?
content.learnIT: Samun damar yin inganci a cikin darussan, koyawa, da albarkatu daga malamai masu koyar da kwararru ba tare da tsada ba.
content.learnFromExperts: Koyi daga masu magana da asalin 'yan ƙasa da kwararru.
content.learnAtYourOwnPace: Yi nazarin shi a cikin naku damar samun damar Unlimited zuwa duk darussan.
content.coverAllAspects: Darussan da yake rufe shi kayan tarihi zuwa batutuwa masu tasowa, ciki har da nahawu, ƙamus, da aikace-aikace da tattaunawa.
content.viewAllIT: Duba duk vactivelg yana gwaji da darussan
content.getStartedForFree: Fara tare da 'yantar da magunguna a yau
content.whatOurLearnersSay: Abin da Xalibanmu suka ce game da Vivelog

testimonial1.quote: Vivelog ya taimaki ni cikin nasara shirya don jarrabawar ta.
testimonial1.name: Nguyen Minh Anh Anh Anh Anh

testimonial2.quote: Koyo shi tare da vivelog bai taɓa zama da sauƙi ba kuma mafi daɗi!
testimonial2.name: Tran Hai Nam

testimonial3.quote: Godiya ga Vivelg, Na inganta dabaru na da muhimmanci.
testimonial3.name: Le Thaid

content.yourOneStopShop: Platurean tsaftace-baya don kwantar da shi kwarewa da jarrabawar Topik. Samun albarkatun Kimiyya na Kasuwanci don Kyauta kuma Ka isa Harshenku da Kalauna a yau!
content.connectWithUs: Haɗa tare da vivelog a kan kafofin watsa labarun

metadata.lesson: Bincika da sabon free ɗinmu darussa kuma ku sami cikakkiyar hanya don matakin ƙwarewar ku.
metadata.grammar: Bincika cikakken zanen yana da zane da koyawa.
